mapper.select: select a.ifqnaSeq, a.ifqnaOrder, a.ifqnaTitle, a.ifqnaCate, a.ifqnaDesc, a.ifqnaDateTime, a.ifqnaDateTimeEdit, a.member_ifmmSeq from qna a where 1 = 1 Order By a.ifqnaSeq desc
mapper.insert: insert into qna( ifqnaOrder, ifqnaTitle, ifqnaCate, ifqnaDesc, ifqnaDateTime, ifqnaDateTimeEdit, member_ifmmSeq )values( #{ifqnaSeq}, #{ifqnaTitle}, #{ifqnaCate}, #{ifqnaDesc}, #{ifqnaDateTime}, #{ifqnaDateTimeEdit}, #{member_ifmmSeq} )
